basic.description: Offered when faculty resources permit, these courses are intensive analyses of particular areas of gender studies interdisciplinary research. Details regarding specific topics will be available from the Head of the Department on an annual basis.
basic.subject: GNDS
basic.title: Special Topics in Gender Studies

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 or above in a GNDS Major or Medial or SXGD plan, or permission of the department and an exclusion of no more than 1 course from GNDS425; WMNS425
